sentences.english: Simple cysts are difficult to distinguish from arachnoid cyst or epidermoid.
sentences.chinese: 單純的囊腫較難與蛛網膜囊腫和表皮樣囊腫相鑑別。

sentences.english: Thymidine kinase gene is found in herpes simplex virus.
sentences.chinese: 胸苷激酶基因被發現在單純皰疹病毒。

sentences.english: But tempering alone is usually not enough.
sentences.chinese: 但是單純的退火是不夠的。

sentences.english: BACKGROUND To observe the therapeutic effects of transplantation of conjunctival flap for pterygium.
sentences.chinese: 觀察單純結膜瓣移植治療翼狀胬肉的療效。

sentences.english: I was not always simple, memorable love cry.
sentences.chinese: 單純的莪，總是爲罘值得留戀的愛情而哭泣。

sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the effect of simple lacrimal passage probing in treating neonatal dacryocystitis.
sentences.chinese: 評價單純淚道探通術對新生兒淚囊炎的治療效果。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of anisodamine in the treatment of simplex anaphylactoid purpura.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價山莨菪鹼治療單純型過敏性紫癜的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Method : the bank of muscle contraction is resected or only cut off in order to relax the muscle.
sentences.chinese: 方法將攣縮帶切除鬆解或單純切斷鬆解。

sentences.english: Objective To enhance the therapeutic effect of simple renal cysts.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高單純性腎囊腫的外科治療效果。

sentences.english: Nadia's story doesn't easily lend itself to either side of the legalization debate.
sentences.chinese: 娜迪婭的經歷不能單純支持合法化辯論的任何一方。

sentences.english: The history of mathematical more than the record of math achievement.
sentences.chinese: 數學史不僅僅是單純的數學成就的編年記錄。

sentences.english: Like your romantic, kind-hearted, simple, tall and strong.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡你的浪漫，善良，單純，高大，有力。

sentences.english: Moreover, 6 patients su ered from redislocation, and 23 patients experienced patella instability.
sentences.chinese: 術後6例發生再脫位，23例出現單純髕骨不穩。

sentences.english: A new modified nonlinear simplex method is offered.
sentences.chinese: 提出了非線性單純形算法的修改算法。

sentences.english: It is difficult to judge whether or not the company type is better than the contract type.
sentences.chinese: 很難單純對公司型和契約型的優劣作出評判。

sentences.english: Simple right sigmoid colon needn t to manage.
sentences.chinese: 單純右位乙狀結腸本身不需處理。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
